titles.title: Small Business Disaster Recovery Improvement Act
Small Business Disaster Recovery Improvement Act
A bill to amend the Small Business Act to provide additional awards for disaster recovery, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

bill.summary:
Small Business Disaster Recovery Improvement Act
This bill requires the Small Business Administration to provide a designated percentage of disaster loan program funding that is available in a given year to assist the disaster recovery and growth of small businesses in an area where the President has declared a major disaster.
